Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: W. Webb "Titanic Core Extra"
Reviews.Content: Just as I expected this television is basically your entry level TV to HD and flat screen realm. It is nice for the bedroom, and casual watching. 2 HDMI hookups, cable and a USB port.When you first turn it on, it will play a little tune, and it will go through the plug and play setup.If you connect it directly to the cable outlet without going through a cable box, you can get all your basic cable channels plus any over the air HD channels, which is quite nice, cause some cable companies do not carry all of the optional over the air HD channels that are now available.A very very thin model, and a price you cant beat!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Review
Reviews.Author: MANOFKRYPTON
Reviews.Content: Recently bought this Television, and thought I would give my thoughts.Pros:1. Energy Costs: 29$ a year, on average.2. Picture Quality: The resolution and video are beautiful, and everything looks immaculate including television, video games, movies.3. Sound: The sound is quite impressive, it is full and rich.4. Setup: Setup and install take about ten minutes.5. Quality: It's a Samsung, and Samsung makes quality, reliable products.6. Can use older electronics with AV component cables.Cons:1. Only comes with two HDMI slots. One may want to buy a box with more HDMI ports, which are cheap.Overall:This television is another great product from Samsung. It offers all of what you would expect it to, and then some.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy!
Reviews.Author: dc
Reviews.Content: Love the TV! It was an excellent purchase. This Samsung's screen does not disappoint. The biggest drawback might be not having a digital audio output (although the speakers are acceptable).

Reviews.Title: My First flast screen
Reviews.Author: T. Williams "A fan of all music, especially 50's"
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen tv. I shopped around and would constantly find myself right back to this TV. After asking a few friends and store sales people, about 75% recommended Samsung and thought this was the best price for the size. I have to admit I used to only buy LG and Sony products but their price for tv's is crazy high. Considering I don't have any experience with flat screen tv's or Samsung, I love this one. So far so good and worth putting up with the crowd on Black Friday.I installed it myself and it is so easy. The hardest part was removing my hunchback old TV that thing weighed like 100 lbs.

Reviews.Title: Value for money
Reviews.Author: Abhi
Reviews.Content: This TV has 2 HDMI slots , 1 USB & 1 component cable slot. No bells and whistles. Took exactly 10 mins to setup. Watched few hd channels and the quality was mind blowing. Streamed HD movies but the quality is not the same like an HD Channel.I upgraded from a standard definition TV and my views are from that perspective.What can one expect for $429. I am thoroughly impressed with the video quality for the amount I spent. Thank you Samsung:).Happy Thanksgiving friends.

Reviews.Title: great deal for a good tv
Reviews.Author: K. Slade
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv from Amazon on Thanksgiving so I would not have to fight the crowd at Walmart, who was selling it at the same price.  With free shipping and no tax I saved $40 too.  It is a great tv with a good picture and sound.  I put it in the playroom for my kids, so now I can get my tv back in the den.

Reviews.Title: Great affordable TV
Reviews.Author: S. Liu
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV in November 2011. It works perfectly. Pictures are nice and crisp. Easy to set up and navigate.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Scooter1959
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for 3 months now and I am still amazed at the picture quality. Plenty of inputs and such. Highly recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Claudia K. Gibson
Reviews.Content: Our second Samsung TV. The picture is beautiful. Wall mounted. We're glad we chose Samsung over others, quality, value and reputation.

Reviews.Title: be aware no computer port.
Reviews.Author: dogfood
Reviews.Content: Overall the quality of the tv is good. But, if you plan on using as a monitor for your computer, it cant be done unless you have a newer digital computer. There is no analog connection on the set. The tv tells you that if you want to use as a computer monitor to use HDMI port 1. They dont tell you it cant work with regular laptops or pcs. Also there is no audio input even if you have digital computer. If you add the cost of upgrading to digital converter or new video card for your computer, not a bargain. Jerry

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: bkt
Reviews.Content: Everything i hoped for!! Great picture and sound! And I couldn't ask for more for the price I paid. I would recommend to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Me!
Reviews.Content: Just a few things, I want to give this TV 4 and a half stars, not the full five.  The reason for that is there are only two HDMI ports.  However, that aside, this tv is wonderful.  It has an internal tuner (so you can pick up local HD channels, which look amazing) and one thing that really impressed me is how black the blacks are.  Not weak black levels on this tv, but very inky dark blacks.  Excellent!  Also, for the price and the brand, this is a killer set!  I paid $430 for it and it is worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Dr. Lyd
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV, good number of inputs, picture is great. We have it in our guest room and it fits and looks perfect.

Reviews.Title: Good choice for the price
Reviews.Author: A. Anthiyurpadmanaban "Anandha"
Reviews.Content: It has been about a month since I bought this and so far so goodpicture quality is good - HD is cool and audio quality is good

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Bo
Reviews.Content: I purchased the TV for my daughter and her family to place in their guest room/in-law suite. It is a very nice TV and the picture is exceptional. The price of the televison was very reasonable and was the deciding factor in my selection over other top name brands televison that I reviewed.

Reviews.Title: very happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: country girl
Reviews.Content: We had been needing a new tv (our old tv was one of the old console models that sat on the floor!) but had been putting it off because of all the information that was out there on tvs -- info overload.  Had my son give me some pointers on what to look for and what to avoid.  I had also heard horror stories about how difficult it is to hook up some of the new tv's.  I ordered this tv on-line on Thanksgiving (instead of standing in line on black Friday) and it was at my house by Monday!  It took me a total of 10 minutes to get it in place and all hooked up -- VERY EASY!  The picture has been great and the sound is fine although I do have to agree that it isn't movie theater quality.  So, when we watch movies we just hook up the stereo to the tv - problem solved.  My only other complaint might be that there is no light behind the manual buttons on the bottom of the screen. So if you can't find the remote and have to use the buttons it is very difficult to tell what and where to press.  All in all this tv has been great so far and I would recommend it.Update -- we have had this tv now for almost 2 years.  Still love it. It has performed well and we have had no problems with it.  However I still don't like that you can't see the little "button" areas on the screen to manually change channel,volume, etc..

Reviews.Title: Our first flat screen
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: We looked for a while for the best value for our first flat screen TV.  This one turned out to be a great deal!  Setup was very easy and the picture is amazing - again our first flat screen.  We have enjoyed watching DVDs and streaming video through our tablet.  Another great deal from Amazon!

Reviews.Title: good tv, not great
Reviews.Author: key-point
Reviews.Content: i bought this tv after looking at a few others (32") for christmas. 40" for the price i paid was nice but it was not what i was expecting. a major factor in me buying this tv was the USB port. i was expecting it to be able to read  movie/ video files such as mp4. the USB only reads mp3 and jpeg files. that was a major dissapointment especially from a brand like Samsung. it would have been NICE for Samsung to put this on the box somewhere to inform consumers. the tv itself was good. nice and clear picture quality. easy to assemble with stand and easy set up. HDMI's do a great gob recognizing external unit (PS3) to upgrade picture resolution.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Stacy E. Pettit
Reviews.Content: Love the samsung 40" tv for our bedroom.  with the wall mount is makes the room brighter and fits perfect in our little room!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: TheCowKing
Reviews.Content: This TV looks awsome. I live in a small barracks room and the first thing everyone see's is my big ol TV. The only issue i have with this TV is the lack of aux ports. Sometimes for my roomates sake i need to wear headphones and the only way to do so is to use something else such as dvd player/game console. It has two HDMI ports which is just enough for me. Very satisfied with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Basic LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Jessica3856
Reviews.Content: It is a great basic LCD HDTV. I got it for a second TV in my gaming room. It does not have any bells or whistles, but those are not what I was wanting. The picture is great and the set up is simple. It has a few different factory picture settings to choose from or you can customize how you would like. And as always with the flatscreens the audio is not great, but is acceptable for my purposes. For a basic HDTV it is worth a look.
